message: Roses are red, Violets are blue, just wanted to say Happy Birthday to you! Happy 19th Anu!!! Wishing you many more amazing years ahead🫶

name: Sreerag
message: Smiles that light the room around,Laughter spreading without a sound.A year of memories, joy, and ease,Moments to treasure, hearts at peace.Happy birthday Anu 🎉❤️

name: Shamna
message: Happy b'day 🦋,i call you that because you never stays at one place ,yet wherever you go,you bring smiles, energy,and positivity.May your life always be as vibrant, free and beautiful as you are .Keep spreading your wings and keep shining ❤️✨
